text:
This was my first time using Airbnb and Billy certainly made it an enjoyable trip!

He did a beautiful job updating his studio...it couldn't have been more perfect and top of the line. 

He was a gracious host and was very helpful with getting me settled. The studio even comes with a Nespresso maker which Billy so generously helped me figure out how to work.

The location is incredible and right up the street from a B-Cycle station which I used to get around the entire time.

I'll definitely be staying here next time I'm back in Austin! :-)
title: Bouldin Avenue Studio
